summary: Are you grow tired of not being able to use Berserker Rage anytime you want? Then this simple mod is just for you!
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod allows you (the player) to use the Berserker Rage whenever it damn pleases you. Here are the stuff that has changed.

- You can activate this power whenever you want! (You have to wait 3 or 5 seconds after you activated it, don't get confused with after the effect is gone)
- Duration is prolonged (Default was 60 seconds, now it's 100 seconds)
- Particle effect (the one in the magic menu selection screen) is changed. (Because I didn't like the presentation of it)
author: baturhan28913
